name: yes (pix64 ""game"")
description:
yes is a ""game"" made in the free pix64 engine where you play as shapeton as you run through levels collecting green guys to stop the evil red dudes

yes has 9 levels (well 10 if you count the "you win" one) and because it's built in pix64 it is very easy to mod and add your own levels or even speedrun....

not convinced? listen to these reviews!

"Dark Prince Approved" - Valtack

"Help pls" -Jerome (certified green dude)

"gay of the year" - chop

"sedlkfdkfjkfdjgd" birthday man

If you wanna share speedruns and levels you can join the discord:https://discord.gg/eAQ8pQj2Ac

thanks and have fun

 also sub to my trash yt. I don't post game dev but I make gaming content it's cool I swear:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ21V_B-owFF_1go7RrensA
